data.title: Exor NV dividend
data.meta_description: Dividend analysis of Exor NV from Netherlands through its amount, percentage 0.54% and payout ratio 1.99%
data.text:
Exor NV is part of Financial Services business, which is part of Financials industry. Exor NV is a company from Netherlands, and his stocks are publicly traded.

Exor NV stock dividend

Exor NV paid a total dividend of 103 million EUR last year, for a market value of 19,127 millions (Market Cap 8,533 millions). Exor NV dividend per share is 0.44 EUR, and his stock market price 81.74 EUR.

According to the chart below, where dividend yield is displayed, Exor NV has a dividend yield of 0.54%, lower than the amount offered by both the market average and companies from Netherlands. It is also lower than average of Financials industry. This low dividend yield might has several explanations: company overpriced, expanding their business,...

In addition, you should compare Exor NV stocks dividend with other Financial Services companies or other of the highest Netherlands dividend stocks list.

Exor NV Dividend Payout

About the ability of Exor NV to maintain his current dividend of EUR 0.44 per share, an amount that accounts for 0.54%, we should study its payout ratio both on earnings and on cash-flows (see chart below). Exor NV payout on ernings is currently 1.99%, which is lower than the market average and companies of Financials industry, which are 39.34% and 46.18% respectively. Both figures lead us to believe that there is confidence that Exor NVcan maintain his current dividend.

The payout on earnings should be complemented with the payout on cash flow since it is this last amount the one which can be distributed to shareholders. Cash flow per share of Exor NV is EUR 20.96 per share, which is higher than the dividend per share paid by the company of EUR 0.44, so the company generates enough cash to maintain his dividend in the future.

The following figure shows payout ratios over earnings and cashflow of Exor NV, compared againt world market average, Netherlands companies, Financials industry and Financial Services sector companies.

Exor NV Dividend History

Below you will find a table with the historical evolution of Exor NV's dividend stock, both in percentage and in EUR, its Payout on Earnings and the number of shares (in case there is an split, number shares altered the dividend per share).

Exor NV Stock performance

Finally, last moth Exor NV showed a return of -3.80% compared to a worldwide -2.49% average, and a -3.03% of Financials firms. Over the last year, the company obtained a 36.20% versus a worldwide performance of a 8.71%. More detailed information can be seen in the following graph for Netherlands and Financial Services firms.
